response:
If only I were built with hands instead of lazers...I might be able to get
out of this room.

Be careful in the testing hangar. They took Freight-500 out there,
and he's never come back. I saw one of the techs walk out of here
with his hard drive. He could probably use a new one...
name: KELT2A
description: a giant military robot with lazers.
